articles.author: Paul Davidson
articles.title: Recession worries rise if Americans save less, spend more. - USA TODAY
articles.description: Americans are spending more and saving less. Forecasters worry that could tip the economy into recession.
articles.content:
Americans are socking away less of their paychecks each month so they have more cash to spend.
The strategy has supported their purchases, and the economy, in recent months, but its bound to run out… [+4716 chars]

articles.title: Researchers develop simple blood test to quickly diagnose sarcoidosis - ETHealthWorld
